titleInfo.title: On the number of step functions with restrictions

mods.abstract: We obtain an asymptotic formula for the number of scaled step functions with restrictions on the length and height of steps (shapes of Young diagrams) of a given area in the neighborhood of a given curve. This allows us to find the asymptotics of the whole number of such functions and find the limit shape - the curve of concentration of the step functions.

titleInfo.title: THEORY OF PROBABILITY AND ITS APPLICATIONS
